description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会主席。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Chairman of the Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 盛茂林的出生地，中华人民共和国湖北省下辖的地级市。
description.en: The birthplace of Sheng Maolin, a prefecture-level city in Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，盛茂林的前任天津市政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's predecessor as Chairman of the CPPCC Tianjin Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，盛茂林的继任天津市政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's successor as Chairman of the CPPCC Tianjin Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，盛茂林的前任中共天津市委组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's predecessor as Director of the Organization Department of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，盛茂林的继任中共天津市委组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's successor as Director of the Organization Department of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，盛茂林的前任中共山西省委组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's predecessor as Director of the Organization Department of the CPC Shanxi Provincial Committee.

description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's successor as Director of the Organization Department of the CPC Shanxi Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，盛茂林的前任中共邵阳市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Shaoyang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，盛茂林的继任中共邵阳市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's successor as Secretary of the CPC Shaoyang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，盛茂林的前任中共资兴市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's predecessor as Secretary of the CPC Zixing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，盛茂林的继任中共资兴市委书记及湖南省人民政府秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Sheng Maolin's successor as Secretary of the CPC Zixing Municipal Committee and as Secretary-General of the Hunan Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十三届全国委员会
中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2018年1月，盛茂林接替臧献甫出任中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会主席。
description.en: In January 2018, Sheng Maolin succeeded Zang Xianfu as Chairman of the CPPCC Tianjin Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2023年1月14日，盛茂林卸任中国人民政治协商会议天津市委员会主席，由王常松接任。
description.en: On January 14, 2023, Sheng Maolin stepped down as Chairman of the CPPCC Tianjin Municipal Committee, and was succeeded by Wang Changsong.

description.zh-cn: 2017年3月，盛茂林接替尹德明出任中共天津市委组织部部长。
description.en: In March 2017, Sheng Maolin succeeded Yin Deming as Director of the Organization Department of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月，盛茂林卸任中共天津市委组织部部长，由喻云林接任。
description.en: In March 2018, Sheng Maolin stepped down as Director of the Organization Department of the CPC Tianjin Municipal Committee, and was succeeded by Yu Yunlin.

description.zh-cn: 2014年9月，盛茂林接替汤涛出任中共山西省委组织部部长。
description.en: In September 2014, Sheng Maolin succeeded Tang Tao as Director of the Organization Department of the CPC Shanxi Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2017年4月，盛茂林卸任中共山西省委组织部部长，由吴汉圣接任。
description.en: In April 2017, Sheng Maolin stepped down as Director of the Organization Department of the CPC Shanxi Provincial Committee, and was succeeded by Wu Hansheng.

description.zh-cn: 2004年5月，盛茂林接替蒋建国出任中共邵阳市委书记。
description.en: In May 2004, Sheng Maolin succeeded Jiang Jianguo as Secretary of the CPC Shaoyang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2007年4月，盛茂林卸任中共邵阳市委书记，由黄天锡接任。
description.en: In April 2007, Sheng Maolin stepped down as Secretary of the CPC Shaoyang Municipal Committee, and was succeeded by Huang Tianxi.

description.zh-cn: 1995年1月，盛茂林接替张万才出任中共资兴市委书记。
description.en: In January 1995, Sheng Maolin succeeded Zhang Wancai as Secretary of the CPC Zixing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2000年4月，盛茂林卸任中共资兴市委书记，由戴道晋接任。2012年3月，盛茂林卸任湖南省人民政府秘书长，同样由戴道晋接任。
description.en: In April 2000, Sheng Maolin stepped down as Secretary of the CPC Zixing Municipal Committee, and was succeeded by Dai Daojin. In March 2012, Sheng Maolin stepped down as Secretary-General of the Hunan Provincial People's Government, and was also succeeded by Dai Daojin.

description.zh-cn: 2010年3月，盛茂林接替武吉海出任湖南省人民政府秘书长。
description.en: In March 2010, Sheng Maolin succeeded Wu Jihai as Secretary-General of the Hunan Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 2004年5月，盛茂林卸任湖南省人口和计划生育委员会主任，由李万郴接任。
description.en: In May 2004, Sheng Maolin stepped down as Director of the Hunan Provincial Population and Family Planning Commission, and was succeeded by Li Wanchen.

description.zh-cn: 2003年3月，盛茂林接替陈满生出任湖南省计划生育委员会主任。
description.en: In March 2003, Sheng Maolin succeeded Chen Mansheng as Director of the Hunan Provincial Family Planning Commission.
